com.pom.crimson.api

Class ContentControllerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pom.crimson.api.ContentControllerAPI

  • public class ContentControllerAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    ContentControllerAPI class contains functions to make GET,PUT,POST,etc calls to content-controller Service API and receive response from same. This uses Rest Assured library to create requests and fetch responses
    Author:
    Venkat Rao Kulkarni, Sivaprakash.Selvaraj

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContentControllerAPI()
      Initializes the Base API class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContentControllerAPI

        public ContentControllerAPI()
        Initializes the Base API class. The base API constructor calls the login method and retrieves the bearer token which is used for authorization of other API end points.

    • Method Detail

      • GetContent

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContent()

      • GetContentId

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentId(java.lang.String contentId)
        sends request to Gets a specific piece of content based on its Strapi ID. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/{contentId}.
        Parameters:
        contentId - Id of the content.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the content.

      • GetContentDailyTipProfileId

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentDailyTipProfileId(java.lang.String profileId)
        sends request to Gets a daily tip for the given profile, if one exists. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/{contentId}.
        Parameters:
        profileId - Profile Id of the user.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the daily tip.

      • GetContentGroupProfileId

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentGroupProfileId(java.lang.String profileId)
        sends request to Fetch recommended content based on a user's joined groups. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/group/{profileId}.
        Parameters:
        profileId - Profile Id of the user.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the recommended content of the profile.

      • GetContentHomePage

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentHomePage(java.lang.String profileId)
        sends request to Fetch recommended content for the homepage. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/homepage.
        Parameters:
        profileId - Profile Id of the user.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the recommended content to be displayed in the homepage of the profile.

      • GetContentIds

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentIds(java.lang.String contentId)
        sends request to Gets a list of content based on given Strapi IDs. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/ids.
        Parameters:
        contentId - Id of the content.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the contents fetched.

      • GetContentInterest

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentInterest(java.lang.String profileId)

      • GetContentProfileId

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentProfileId(java.lang.String profileId)
        sends request to Fetch recommended content based on a user's interests. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/profile/{profileId}.
        Parameters:
        profileId - Profile Id of the user.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the recommended content based on user's interest.

      • GetContentInterestName

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentInterestName(java.lang.String profileId,
                                                               java.lang.String interestName)
        sends request to Fetch recommended content based on a specific interest. Uses content-controller API. End point - GET /content/interest/{interestName}.
        Parameters:
        profileId - profile Id of the user.
        interestName - Name of interest.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the contents fetched based on the interest.
